name: Hat at Thee
description:
A game I made for the Flashpunk forums Punkweek, years ago (2011 I think). Its unfinished and pretty terrible.

Puzzle platformer. Control different bodies to get the key and reach the door (you are some kind of evil top hat organism).

Arrows: Move
Z: Jump
C: Shoot hat. Press up to shoot upwards.
R: Reset level.

Small gentlemen jump higher and fit in small places. Fat gentlemen break some blocks, push other blocks, and are bigger, and can be used as a way to reach higher places.

Kudos to Chevyray, for the awesome flashpunk, and Noel Berry, for the Advanced Platforming Engine I used in this game.
